nodes.text: The Virgillian Free Alignment Starfleet was the military arm of the Virgillian Free Alignment. Formed during the Virgillian Civil War, the Starfleet was aligned to Alliance to Restore the Republic. The Alliance donated several Quasar Fire-class bulk cruisers to the Starfleet. A twenty-two starship force, including the Flurry and the Dukedoom under the command of Captain Tessa Manchisco, fought with the Alliance Fleet at the Battle of Endor.
